query: SELECT prefecture, propertyType, COUNT(*) as count, AVG(tradePriceTotal) as avg_price FROM transactions WHERE prefecture IN ('東京都', '神奈川県', '大阪府', '愛知県', '福岡県') GROUP BY prefecture, propertyType ORDER BY prefecture, propertyType
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 4Rc7drD6ZCiTxbp.6c4f27fb1d84 --database R4vCcFNnyAc3ewAPUNxkML --execute SELECT prefecture, propertyType, COUNT(*) as count, AVG(tradePriceTotal) as avg_price FROM transactions WHERE prefecture IN ('東京都', '神奈川県', '大阪府', '愛知県', '福岡県') GROUP BY prefecture, propertyType ORDER BY prefecture, propertyType
